Producer: Mark Amin, Jeff Beesley, Thor Bradwell, Cassian Elwes, Dave Hansen, Gary Pearl, Giri Tharan, Patrick Walmsley, Julie Yorn
Production Co: Fyzz Facility Film One, Buffalo Gal Pictures, Sobini Films, LBI Entertainment, Elevated
Synopsis: A young woman named Savannah Knoop spends six years pretending to be the celebrated author JT LeRoy, the made-up literary persona of her sister-in-law.
Title: J.T. LeRoy
